constraints.name: stack_operations
constraints.description: 所有操作必须在栈上进行，每次只能添加或移除栈顶元素

constraints.name: exercise_order
constraints.description: 必须按照给定的顺序完成所有练习

constraints.name: initial_final_state
constraints.description: 初始状态和最终状态都必须是空栈

constraints.name: weight_requirements
constraints.description: 每个练习需要特定数量的不同类型的权重
